bookTitle: Spice and Wolf Anniversary Collector's Edition
bookSeries: 狼と香辛料 / Spice & Wolf: Light Novel #1-17
Plot: Spice and Wolf is ten years old! To commemorate this anniversary, Yen Press is producing a lavish tome collecting all seventeen original volumes of Spice and Wolf. Beautifully bound and impressively designed to give the impression of a medieval manuscript, the book will also include all of illustrator Jyuu Ayakura's original illustrations. This book will be the crown jewel in any collector's library!
